long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Primirest+ is designed to improve the experience of using the Primirest ordering website (www.mujprimirest.cz). 
It changes the look of the website, but the main function is adding an image next to the foods name. The image either comes from our own database of images, that correspond to the real foods that were once cooked, or they come from google images.
There is also support for star food rating (If you want to publish your rating, you need to login using your google account) (Check learn section inside extension if you're the Brave browser user)
And there is support for Dark / Light mode.

The whole project has a public repo at: github.com/Xopabyteh/Seminary_PrimirestPlus_Gen2
